title: The Need for Real-Time Data to Combat the Coronavirus
itunes:title: The Need for Real-Time Data to Combat the Coronavirus
description:
Alyssa Rapp, CEO of Surgical Solutions, talks about providing services and equipment for hospitals and health facilities fighting the coronavirus pandemic. Stewart Glickman, Energy Analyst at CFRA Research, breaks down the crash of the oil market. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Trade Reporter Shawn Donnan discuss America needing real-time data to get through the health crisis. And we Drive to the Close with Jamie Cuellar, Portfolio Manager at Buffalo Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
